But some people are wondering if more nonstop flights out of Dallas Love Field will translate to more noise at the airport .
Construction of the airport expansion has had an impact on Southwest Airlines planes .
Officials stated that jets are more frequently using the runway which goes along Lemmon Avenue because of the construction work being done .

That has caused more noise in nearby neighborhoods .
Those involved in preparing for the October end of the Wright Amendment said that it has always been their understanding that there would be no change in the noise levels around Dallas Love Field .
But residents argue otherwise , saying that more flights later this year , and bigger planes , will certainly mean more noise .
